column6:
"Sandblasted" Conclusion. ,2007,4
With Sandman's father on death row and his time running out like sand through an hourglass, Spider-Man and Sandman discover that the only hope of saving him lies in unsnarling the secret of the murderous "Uncle Ben"...a confrontation which sets the stage for the upcoming FNSM annual, "Sandman: Year One."
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Rob Campanella | writer:Peter David | colorist:John Kalisz | penciller:Todd Nauck | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Mike Wieringo
